root.name: Galax-e-mail
root.description: StoryWhen e-mails are sent to your inbox they are sent through wormholes to a galaxy where star-fighters fight off aliens trying to stop you from delivering them to other inboxes.Power-Ups, Power-Downs Face button powers Power-UpsHealthDouble-shot:gives you 2 shots at a timeSwarm: cause enemies to come to you Bulls-eye-shot: homes in on targetsPower-DownsSlow: makes you slowerFast:makes it to where you are going all the timePeace:cant shotConfusion: flips the controls Face button powersNuke: blows everything up on screen Warp: takes you to another part of the mapWall-buster: destroys the blue wallsInvinciball: makes you invincibleShip Transform You can change the ship at anytime with the trigger or bumper buttons into 4 formsBase form-good firing and movement speed, ok armorRocket form -fast firing and movement speed, Weak armorBattleship form -slow firing and movement speed, heavy armor with the most damage
